title: C Takımı 2
overview: The team gets stuck in the town of "Fenk" in Elazığ while running away from Orhan's men. They take refuge in Murtaza Ağa's farm, where they start working to stay out of sight and make a living. Murtaza Ağa is known for being a cruel and stingy landlord. Just as the group is at their wits' end, they receive a call from Abdi's wife, Neriman, and are forced to flee the farm in a hurry and head to Kastamonu. On their way, they steal Murtaza Ağa's money and kidnap his daughter.
